title: Methodology: GVC Decomposition with adbmrio
text: adbmrio package provides streamlined toolkit analyzing Global Value Chains (GVCs) using Asian Development Bank Multi-Regional Input-Output (ADB MRIO) tables. vignette explains mathematical framework behind two primary decomposition methods implemented package: National 5-Part Decomposition (Zhang et al., 2017) Bilateral WWZ Decomposition (Wang et al., 2013). demonstrate methods using built-toy_mrio dataset (4 countries, 3 sectors).

title: Methodology: GVC Decomposition with adbmrio
text: Dom_Fin: Output produced consumed domestically final goods. Dom_Int: Output used intermediates produce domestic goods consumed domestically. code: # Compare bilateral trade relationships china_india <- compute_bilateral_wwz(toy_mrio, 2023, s_idx = 1, r_idx = 2) china_usa <- compute_bilateral_wwz(toy_mrio, 2023, s_idx = 1, r_idx = 3)  # Which trade partner has more complex value chains? china_india_gvc_share <- sum(china_india$DVA_GVC1) / sum(china_india$DVA_Fin + china_india$DVA_Int) china_usa_gvc_share <- sum(china_usa$DVA_GVC1) / sum(china_usa$DVA_Fin + china_usa$DVA_Int)  cat("China-India GVC Share:", round(china_india_gvc_share * 100, 1), "%\n") cat("China-USA GVC Share:", round(china_usa_gvc_share * 100, 1), "%\n")

title: ADB MRIO Analysis for Global Value Chain Decomposition
text: adbmrio package R toolbox Global Value Chain (GVC) analysis using Asian Development Bank (ADB) Multi-Regional Input-Output (MRIO) tables. implements decomposition methods move directly ADB MRIO data bilateral national indicators production sharing, embodied CO‚ÇÇ, value-added flows across countries sectors. package implements Two-Track Approach: Track (Macro): National 5-part decomposition Gross Output, Value-Added, CO‚ÇÇ emissions country sector. Track B (Micro): Bilateral export decomposition based Wang‚ÄìWei‚ÄìZhu (WWZ) framework, including DVA, FVA, GVC-related terms.

title: ADB MRIO Analysis for Global Value Chain Decomposition
text: Bilateral Export Decomposition: Decompose gross bilateral exports domestic value-added, foreign value-added, double-counting components following Wang‚ÄìWei‚ÄìZhu (WWZ) framework. National Aggregation: Compute forward linkages total GVC participation country level (5-Part Model). Environmental Accounting: Calculate embodied CO‚ÇÇ emissions trade flows. Value-Added Analysis: Trace value-added content across global production networks (DVA vs FVA). Sectoral Granularity: Full support 35 sectors across 63 economies. Matrix Extraction Tools: Extract raw Input-Output (ZZ) matrices specific country pairs. Performance Optimized: Sparse matrix algebra block-wise operations efficient computation.

title: ADB MRIO Analysis for Global Value Chain Decomposition
text: Provide analytical tools bilateral national GVC decomposition using ADB MRIO data. Generate quantitative indicators GVC participation, positioning, embodied emissions. Support climate-related trade studies embodied CO‚ÇÇ calculations exports imports. Facilitate reproducible MRIO-based empirical research standardizing data structures functions.
